content: sweet little barn owls inspired this baby blanket design i imagined them perched in a row getting ready for one last flight before saying good night this blanket makes a wonderful gift for a special little person in your life pattern is designed for a 23x30 inches blanket perfect for a crib or in a stroller the pattern includes instructions to customize its size and make the blanket smaller or larger as desired yarn and notions yarn 600 yards approximately 250 g dk weight yarn sample in silk/yak dk by alley cat yarns colourway au naturel alley cat yarns website https //alleycatyarns ca/collections/silk-yak-dk needles 4mm circulars with a 32 cable other notions cable needle stitch markers scissors darning needle gauge 21 sts = 4 inches in stockinette
